last_episode_to_air.name: Zeroing In
last_episode_to_air.overview: Back in Traverse City, Matty joins the team to review all the incredible finds uncovered this year and gets a head start on what's to come.

name: The Curse of Oak Island: Drilling Down
original_name: The Curse of Oak Island: Drilling Down
overview: A companion series to “The Curse of Oak Island,” this series gives new viewers a crash course into what “The Curse of Oak Island” is all about. The series features different guests, including interviews and in-depth and thought provoking discussions surrounding “The Curse of Oak Island.” Oak Island has intrigued treasure hunters for hundreds of years, as it is believed to hold one of the greatest treasures of all time, but nobody can find it. Two brothers from Michigan have bought the rights to much of the island so that they can attempt to crack the mystery of the curse and find the treasure.

seasons.name: Season 11
seasons.overview: Season 11 of The Curse of Oak Island: Drilling Down premiered on November 7, 2023.

episodes.name: Drilling Down on Season 3
episodes.overview: As a companion to season three, the studio talk show, "The Curse of Oak Island: Drilling Down," will serve as a crash course for new viewers and include a variety of special guests, interviews and in-depth, thought-provoking discussion of History's hit series "The Curse of Oak Island."

episodes.name: Drilling Down on "Columbus Day"
episodes.overview: The Oak Island dig team is in the studio revealing new details and insights on episode 309, including the Harvey Morash 10X dive and the mysterious submerged triangular stones. Plus Dave Blankenship reveals details about his near-death accident. And, an author comes to the studio to pitch a new theory to Marty and Rick, one that involves FDR.

episodes.name: Drilling Down on "Silence in the Dark"
episodes.overview: As a companion to season three, the studio talk show, “The Curse of Oak Island: Drilling Down,” will serve as a crash course for new viewers and include a variety of special guests, interviews and in-depth, thought-provoking discussion of History’s hit series “The Curse of Oak Island.”

episodes.name: Drilling Down on "Sword Play"
episodes.overview: As a companion to season three, the studio talk show, “The Curse of Oak Island: Drilling Down,” will serve as a crash course for new viewers and include a variety of special guests, interviews and in-depth, thought-provoking discussion of History’s hit series “The Curse of Oak Island.”

episodes.name: Drilling Down on "Voices from Below"
episodes.overview: As a companion to season three, the studio talk show, “The Curse of Oak Island: Drilling Down,” will serve as a crash course for new viewers and include a variety of special guests, interviews and in-depth, thought-provoking discussion of History’s hit series “The Curse of Oak Island.”

episodes.name: Drilling Down on "Secrets and Revelations"
episodes.overview: As a companion to season three, the studio talk show, “The Curse of Oak Island: Drilling Down,” will serve as a crash course for new viewers and include a variety of special guests, interviews and in-depth, thought-provoking discussion of History’s hit series “The Curse of Oak Island.”

episodes.name: The Boys are Back
episodes.overview: A recap of last season and a crash course for new viewers of History’s hit series “The Curse of Oak Island.”

episodes.name: A Look Ahead
episodes.overview: Rick, Marty and the Oak Island team meet up with Matty Blake to reveal new discoveries and discuss future plans.

episodes.name: The Journey Continues
episodes.overview: On the heels of the Season Five premiere of The Curse of Oak Island, Matty Blake gets an exclusive sneak peek at all that lies ahead for the fellowship of the dig, including a just-discovered artifact.

episodes.name: The Puzzle Takes Shape
episodes.overview: Matty Blake returns to Oak Island to get a closer look at all the great discoveries made this season, and to find out what’s next for Rick, Marty and the team in their quest to solve the mystery of Oak Island.

episodes.name: Nothing Will Stop Them
episodes.overview: Matty Blake treks to Oak Island to take a look at the team’s latest and most epic operation yet, as well as get new insight from brothers Rick and Marty Lagina on the many highlights from the first five years of their quest.

episodes.name: Putting the Pieces Together
episodes.overview: The lead cross and the red gemstones are only the latest artifacts discovered in the 223-year-old treasure hunt. This special takes viewers back to the very beginning of the hunt, chronicling the discoveries of generations of searchers.

episodes.name: The Truth Behind the Curse
episodes.overview: If there’s a curse on Oak Island, where does it come from? Some believe that there’s a power at play that’s fighting against the discovery of the Oak Island treasure. Others believe that dislodging the 90 ft stone unleashed the curse. Nobody knows what’s buried on Oak Island but everyone wonders if retrieving it might come with consequences.

episodes.name: The Pirates of Oak Island
episodes.overview: Ever since the discovery of the Money Pit, Oak Island has been closely linked to colorful tales of pirates. Did they land on Oak Island more than 200 years ago and bury an incredible treasure? This one-hour special episode drills down on the myths, legends and compelling evidence that pirates were behind the world’s longest treasure hunt.

episodes.name: The Secret Weapons
episodes.overview: In the past 10 years, Rick and Marty Lagina–along with their partners, Craig Tester and Dan Blankenship, have made some incredible discoveries. But they would be the first to tell you they didn’t make all these discoveries on their own. In this special, we focus on a group of guys who have become Oak Island’s “secret weapons.” Gary Drayton, Charles Barkhouse, Doug Crowell, Paul Troutman, Dan Henskee and Tony Sampson.

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.overview: Matty Blake joins the Laginas and members of the Oak Island team in Michigan to hear the shocking results of the seismic testing done in the swamp. And in a moving tribute, the brotherhood of the dig remembers Dan Blankenship.

episodes.name: The Journey Continues
episodes.overview: On the heels of the Season Five premiere of The Curse of Oak Island, Matty Blake gets an exclusive sneak peek at all that lies ahead for the fellowship of the dig, including a just-discovered artifact.

episodes.name: The Puzzle Takes Shape
episodes.overview: Matty Blake returns to Oak Island to get a closer look at all the great discoveries made this season, and to find out what's next for Rick, Marty and the team in their quest to solve the mystery of Oak Island.

episodes.name: Nothing Will Stop Them
episodes.overview: Matty Blake treks to Oak Island to take a look at the team's most epic operation yet, and gets insight from Rick and Marty on the many highlights from the first five years of their quest.

episodes.name: Putting the Pieces Together
episodes.overview: Reviewing the discoveries of generations of searchers leads to the lead cross and red gemstones that are only the latest artifacts discovered in the 223-year-old treasure hunt.

episodes.name: The Truth Behind the Curse
episodes.overview: Some believe that there's a power at play that's fighting against the discovery of the Oak Island treasure; nobody knows what's buried on Oak Island but everyone wonders if retrieving it might come with...

episodes.name: The Pirates of Oak Island
episodes.overview: Examines myths, legends, and compelling evidence that pirates were behind the world's longest treasure hunt on Oak Island.

episodes.name: The Secret Weapons
episodes.overview: A profile of Gary Drayton, Charles Barkhouse, Doug Crowell, Paul Troutman, Dan Henskee, and Tony Sampson, who have become Oak Island's secret weapons for Nick and Marty Lagina, Craig Tester, and Dan Blankenship.

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.overview: Matty Blake joins the Laginas and members of the Oak Island team in Michigan to hear the results of the seismic testing done in the swamp. The brotherhood of the dig remembers Dan Blankenship.

episodes.name: Finding Answers
episodes.overview: Matty Blake returns to Oak Island and gets an insider's look at the staggering new operations brothers Rick and Marty Lagina have launched in their efforts to finally solve the 224-year-old Oak Island mystery.

episodes.name: The Great Feud
episodes.overview: For nearly half a century, Dan Blankenship and Fred Nolan work tirelessly to solve the Oak Island mystery; however, a bitter feud between the two men keeps them from succeeding in solving the mystery.

episodes.name: William Shatner Meets Oak Island
episodes.overview: Television icon William Shatner joins the team in the war room and gets a first-hand look at how an obscure island off the coast of Nova Scotia has become a global phenomenon.

episodes.name: The Shakespeare Connection
episodes.overview: Television icon William Shatner explores the possibility that the Oak Island treasure might not be one of gold and jewels, but instead, of priceless paper.

episodes.name: Closer Than Ever
episodes.overview: Matty visits Oak Island in the dead of winter, days before the pandemic changes the world.

episodes.name: Oak Island and the Founding Fathers
episodes.overview: What if the Oak Island treasure not only exists, but a portion of it was taken and was used to finance something of even greater value–America’s freedom.

episodes.name: Hold On To Your Seats
episodes.overview: Matty Blake returns to Oak Island and gets an insider’s look at the struggles and unbelievable triumphs Rick and Marty Lagina have experienced this year in their efforts to finally solve the 224-year-old Oak Island mystery.

episodes.name: Gary Drayton's Top 10 Finds
episodes.overview: Intrepid metal detector and Oak Island legend Gary Drayton, takes Matty Blake on a metal detecting tour of the island while counting down his most memorable finds.

episodes.name: Dave Blankenship's Oak Island
episodes.overview: Matty Blake sits down with Oak Island legend Dave Blankenship and takes a deep dive into Dave's history on the island while trying to understand why he stepped away from the 2 centuries old treasure hunt that he and his father devoted their lives to.

episodes.name: The Oak Island Connection
episodes.overview: Matty Blake returns to Oak Island to connect to the countless people that the 225-year-old mystery, and the hit TV show that chronicles it, have impacted over the last decade.

episodes.name: The Making Of
episodes.overview: For the first time in The Curse of Oak Island history, Rick, Marty and the team are allowing viewers behind the scenes to see how every incredible moment on Oak Island is captured.

episodes.name: Theories Galore
episodes.overview: In the dead of winter, Matty Blake visits the fellowship to debate the vast range of theories on who might have brought treasure to Oak Island.

episodes.name: The Best is Yet to Come
episodes.overview: Matty travels to Traverse City, Michigan and meets with Rick, Marty, Craig, Alex and Jack to review the discoveries made in season 8. Also, we hear what might be in store for season 9.

episodes.name: Rick and Marty's Top Moments
episodes.overview: Rick and Marty talk about their top moments from past seasons of “The Curse of Oak Island.”

episodes.name: Dawn of the Dig
episodes.overview: Matty Blake returns to Oak Island and gets an insider's look at the trials and unbelievable triumphs the Laginas and their team have experienced this year in their quest to finally solve the old Oak Island mystery.

episodes.name: Behind the Quest
episodes.overview: Matty Blake pulls back the curtain and shares the surprising challenges and triumphs of documenting a 226-year-old treasure mystery, talking to members of the intrepid film crew to get the insider's take on how some of the most memorable and iconic moments in The Curse of Oak Island were captured.

episodes.name: Preserving the Hunt
episodes.overview: Matty Blake "Drills Down" with the Laginas and the Fellowship of the Dig on how they strive to preserve Oak Island while working to unravel its centuries old treasure mystery.

episodes.name: The Sea-crets of Oak Island
episodes.overview: Matty Blake dives in head first to investigate underwater points of interest off the shores of Oak Island, in search of clues that might help solve the 227-year-old mystery.

episodes.name: The Game Is Afoot
episodes.overview: The Laginas and their team give Matty Blake a sneak peek of Season 10.

episodes.name: Decoding The Money Pit
episodes.overview: Matty Blake and the team examine the most compelling sites in the Money Pit area where the original treasure shaft and the legendary treasure could be located.

episodes.name: Deep Inside the Dig
episodes.overview: Matty Blake joins the Laginas and their team to get an exclusive "behind the scenes" look at a day of film production for The Curse of Oak Island.

episodes.name: European Connections
episodes.overview: Matty Blake joins the Fellowship as they look back on all the incredible clues and connections they’ve discovered over the last decade of the treasure hunt.

episodes.name: Closing In
episodes.overview: Matty travels to Traverse City, Michigan to meet with Rick, Marty, Craig, Alex and Jack to review the incredible discoveries made in Season 10, and get a jump start on what's to come in Season 11.

episodes.name: Back to the Hunt
episodes.overview: Matty Blake returns to Oak Island and gets an insider's look at the incredible challenges and triumphs the fellowship of the dig have experienced this year in their quest to finally solve the old Oak Island mystery.

episodes.name: The Lot 5 Enigma
episodes.overview: The Fellowship has been intensely investigating Lot 5 since the Laginas purchased it more than a year ago, and now Matty Black takes a deep dive into the clues the lot has provided and what those clues could mean.

episodes.name: Decoding the Swamp
episodes.overview: Matty Blake takes a deep dive into a brackish bog in attempt to finally piece together the mysterious clues discovered in the Oak Island swamp.

episodes.name: Written in the Stars
episodes.overview: Matty Blake heads to Oak Island to dig deep on the scientific method that may solve the Oak Island mystery.

episodes.name: The Evolution of the Dig
episodes.overview: Matty Blake joins the Fellowship to recount the highs and lows of the longest treasure hunt in history, and shines a light on how far the team has come.

episodes.name: Zeroing In
episodes.overview: Back in Traverse City, Matty joins the team to review all the incredible finds uncovered this year and gets a head start on what's to come.

11.name: Season 11
11.overview: Season 11 of The Curse of Oak Island: Drilling Down premiered on November 7, 2023.
